subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ernie Banks, who had a Hall of Fame career with the Chicago Cubs from 1953 to 1971, last month told The Tribune Company's chief executive, Dennis FitzSimons, that he would like to be part of a group that could buy the team, Crain's Chicago Business reported on its Web site.
